name: netket
description: MCP server for NetKet quantum many-body physics analysis. Create, analyze, and visualize quantum systems using natural language interfaces. Supports multiple lattice geometries and Hamiltonian models.

examples.title: SSH Model Analysis
examples.description: Analyze the SSH model for a chain with specific parameters
examples.prompt: Analyze the SSH model for a 24-site chain with t1=1.0 and t2=0.2

examples.title: Heisenberg Model
examples.description: Study the Heisenberg model on a 2D lattice
examples.prompt: Create and analyze a 2D Heisenberg model on a 4x4 square lattice

examples.title: Energy Spectrum Calculation
examples.description: Calculate and visualize energy spectra of quantum systems
examples.prompt: Calculate the energy spectrum of a 1D Hubbard model with 10 sites

examples.title: Ground State Properties
examples.description: Analyze ground state properties of quantum systems
examples.prompt: Find the ground state properties of a spin-1/2 Heisenberg chain with 12 sites
